title: logotype
content:
Hello everybody,

I would be very happy to get some critics about his logotype that I’m trying to finish now. It’s for our graphic design studio and should be very simple. I have decided to use this typeface [...and man it was hard] I need to know what is your choice? That happy “e” is on my mind now.  
What about spacing?

Thank you a lot! I really enjoy reading your thoughts on Typophile.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013104553im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ECS%20-%20ON_4179.jpg)

 [‹ Correct use of small caps at the beginning of a paragraph](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013104553/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17024 "Go to previous forum topic") [Where is a good college/ institute to take a one year program in graphic design? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013104553/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45733 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ecuson

comments.content:
Out of these two?  
2nd one.

_(But, Only if you are going for the ’Slightly Retro’ look, as this one may seem/look ’dated’ pretty soon, if not yet already. ;) I still like/prefer it.)_
